game.name: Army Truck Transport
game.description:
Transporting is a very difficult job and requires precision in driving. Do you think that you are able to deliver this cargo on time? If yes, join Army Truck Transport and be prepared to drive an amazing truck that is full of cargo items. The best part is that you will be asked to choose your vehicle and level at the initial level. Take your seat on your favorite vehicle and gear up to take the most difficult ride of your life!

Start the driving fun by choosing your vehicle and then finalizing your level in this brand new racing challenge! Hurry up as the people are waiting for you on the next military base. Make sure to drive carefully when the speed breakers come and do not let your cargo fall down to complete your mission successfully. Be fast since the clock is also running very fast in this HTML5 truck game! There are 10 unique levels and three lovely army trucks to select from.

The right kind of driving confidence will be built up within you when you finish all the levels of this cute 3D military driving game. Keep your eyes on the screen to avoid falling and reach your target before the time expires! This cool truck driving simulator includes easy controls, seamless gameplay, and colorful graphics. You would definitely fall in love with this car game challenge even after a few attempts. Good luck browsing through our extensive range of free racing games that you can play without download!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Army Truck Transport at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
